name: ckomop0x
description:
With solid experience after 13+ years of Web, 10+ years of Frontend, and 7+ years of commercial React/TypeScript development. Team player with experience in leading distributed frontend teams. Focus on architecture, performance, stability, and user experience.

In my free time, I do many studies to keep my skills up-to-date, have wide knowledge in related fields. I participate in pet and open-source projects, mentor developers of all levels.

Open source projects: - Create HTML boilerplate - Gatsby TypeScript template
